captions.text:
TWITCH: So I'm going to teach
you a couple of eight counts

TWITCH: Now, Chuck
Maldonado did it.

And I'm going right,
left, right, left.

So, I'm going right,
left, right.
Now I'm hopping to the right.

Now I'm going to smooth
it around like this.

Yeah, so I smooth it around
once and twice.

Now, I'm going to hit whatever
I want-- five and

ALLISON HOLKER: How
did you do?

TWITCH: All right, that was a
little sample from the finale

Check it out in theaters
July 27.

title: Step Up Revolution - Official Dance Tutorial - Stephen tWitch Boss - Chuck Maldonado Choreography
